title: Herbed potato soup
ingredients: ['2 medium potatoes, peeled and diced', '500ml water (or veg stock for more flavour)', '1 large onion, chopped', '60g butter, cubed', '4 tablespoons plain flour', '1 teaspoon salt, or to taste', '1/2 teaspoon dried thyme', '1/4 teaspoon dried rosemary, crushed', '1/4 teaspoon pepper', '350ml milk']
